section.title: Overview
section.p: The Apache FTP Server is a 100% pure Java FTP server. We have designed it to be a complete and portable ftp server engine solution based on currently available open protocols.

It is also a FTP application platform. We have developed a Java API to let you write Java code to process FTP event notifications that we call the Ftplet API. Apache FTP Server provides an implementation of FTP server to support this API.

ol.li: 100% pure Java, free, open source resumable FTP server!!!
Multi platform support and multithreaded design.
User virtual directory, write permission, idle time-out and upload/download bandwidth limitation support.
You can monitor all the user activities.
Both upload and download files are resumable.
Handles both ASCII and binary data transfers.
IP restriction support to allow/ban IPs.
Database and LDAP can be used to store user data.
All the FTP messages are customizable.
MDTM support - your users can change the date-time stamp of files.
"MODE Z" support for faster data upload/download.
Custom user manager, IP restrictor, logger can be added easily.
User event notifications can be added (Ftplet).
